Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
mathematica: Collatz[n_] := NestWhileList[If[EvenQ[#], #/2, 3 # + 1] &, n, # > 1 &]; nn = 100; t = Table[0, {nn}]; n = 0; zeros = nn; While[zeros > 0, n++; c = Collatz[n]; Do[If[i <= nn && t[[i]] == 0, t[[i]] = n; zeros--], {i, c}]]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Dec 03 2012 *)
